I absolutely recommend trying this product. one of the better pairs of open ear headphones I've sampled. Solid product! Battery Life (5/5) One of the best features of these earbuds is their 120-hour battery life (including the case). Each earbud lasts 24 hours on a single charge, which is impressive. This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. My reviews: 1. The product, its design in itself is good.. It's battery back-up is unbelievably large as compared to its size. 2. It fits in any kind of ear and shows a good balance between music and environmental awareness. 3. It has an impressive Mike- that captures your voice.. Yet they cannot catch the low intensity voice. Some drawbacks and suggestions. 1. There is no problem with the air clips but the case has its own problems- like it does not show how much battery is remaining in it. 2. The magnets are loose so one needs to adjust the airclips inside the after placing them. 3. The airclips get automatically connected with the device even when they are inside the case and the case is in your pocket!-because the magnets are loose! 4. As the case is tiny, it's power backup is less. (The battery's shelf-life also seems to be less.) Else all is fine.. Design & Comfort (4.5/5) The earbuds come in a sleek, pebble-shaped charging case with an LED indicator, giving them a premium look. The matte finish on the earbuds provides a solid grip, and they feel comfortable in the ears, even during long listening sessions. Multiple ear tip sizes ensure a snug fit. Audio Performance (4.5/5) The 10mm drivers deliver powerful sound with dual EQ modes \u2013 boAt Signature Sound for deep bass lovers and Balanced Mode for a more natural sound. The Crystal Bionic Sound with HiFi\u00ae DSP enhances audio clarity, making music and calls sound crisp. Battery Life (5/5) One of the best features of these earbuds is their 120-hour battery life (including the case). Each earbud lasts 24 hours on a single charge, which is impressive. This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price. If you\u2019re looking for budget-friendly earbuds with premium features, these are a great choice. Pros: \u2714\ufe0f Excellent battery life (120 hours) \u2714\ufe0f Great sound with dual EQ modes \u2714\ufe0f Comfortable fit and premium design \u2714\ufe0f Low-latency mode for gaming \u2714\ufe0f Clear call quality with quad mics Cons: \u274c No Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) \u274c Touch controls could be more responsive Would I recommend it? This is my Nirvana's 2nd purchase in a row from amazon, earlier bought a Nirvana Ion ANC Pro. While Nirvana Ion ANC Pro excels in audio quality & playtime, it had few issues like: -not fit for workouts/running/cycling, keeps slipping-dropping, tried changing bud sizes, no luck.. -slow connections (sometimes as worse as manually redo unpairing-pairing with devices) -super sensitive touch leading to unintended play-pause triggers....confusing Surprisingly, with Nirvana X -audio quality is great (a notch higher than Nirvana Ion ANC in my opinion) -Nirvana X is amazing for workouts/running, it just doesn't slip at all....big wow for that ! -lightening quick bluetooth connections with devices & multi connections -touch controls are smoother BUT also: -Observed few instances where left ear bud went silent for few youtube videos while right side was ok. I wish this had an app to customize the gesture controls. I would prefer to be able to change the volume up/down to hold-touch gestures. When you hold touch, on the left side\u2014it plays a strange message? \"We fight\" or \"Game over\" to volume up/down, you have tap once each time for a volume level. which is a bit cumbersome, especially given that other gestures are multiple taps, like 3 taps quickly for previous/next on either side. a hold touch would be much better for volume control. I am very likely returning this but again, only because I'm looking for a very specific design and function. I absolutely recommend trying this product. one of the better pairs of open ear headphones I've sampled. Solid product! Pros: +Secure Neckband, earloops +Great sound quality +Easy to clean, it seems? +Simple, functional touch-gesture controls Cons: -A little stiff to change between neckband/earloops. Battery Life (5/5) One of the best features of these earbuds is their 120-hour battery life (including the case). Each earbud lasts 24 hours on a single charge, which is impressive. This makes them perfect for long trips without worrying about frequent charging. Call Quality & Connectivity (4/5) The quad-mic setup with ENx\u2122 technology significantly reduces background noise during calls. The person on the other end hears your voice clearly. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.2, ensuring a stable connection with no noticeable lag. Gaming & Additional Features (4/5) With a 60ms low-latency mode, gaming and watching videos are smooth, with minimal audio delay. They also feature in-ear detection, pausing playback when removed from the ears, which is a convenient touch. Final Verdict (4.5/5) The boAt Nirvana Ion earbuds offer excellent sound, a stylish design, and an unmatched battery life at an affordable price.
